
{{Server client function}}
This function returns a [[/float.md|float]] containing the size of the specified marker.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">float getMarkerSize ( marker myMarker )</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/Marker.md|Marker]]:getSize|size|setMarkerSize}}
===Required Arguments===
*'''myMarker''': The [[/marker.md|marker]] that you wish to retrieve the size of.

===Returns===
Returns a [[/float.md|float]] containing the size of the specified marker.

==Example==
This example creates a marker and outputs the size to everyone.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
-- Create a maker
newMarker = createMarker ( 1, 1000, 1000, 1000, 1,0,0 )
-- If the marker was created successfully then...
if ( newMarker ~= false ) then
	-- Tell everyone about it
	outputChatBox ( "Current marker size: " .. getMarkerSize ( newMarker ) )
end
</syntaxhighlight>
